title.value: Breaking Barriers to Creative Expression: Co-Designing and Implementing an Accessible Text-to-Image Interface
title.justification: This is the title given at the beginning of the paper and in the ACM reference format section.
title.quote: Breaking Barriers to Creative Expression: Co-Designing and Implementing an Accessible Text-to-Image Interface

extractions.description: This paper documents the development of an alternative user interface called PromptAssist, aimed at reducing the effort needed to enter image prompts for text-to-image models by providing suggestions from a large language model. The work focuses on improving accessibility for users with motor disabilities to create visual art using text-to-image models.

type.justification: The paper involves the design, development, iterative testing, and feedback collection process within a project team to improve the accessibility of text-to-image models. This makes it an empirical study.
type.quote: In this paper, we document the development of an alternative user interface... developed through iterative design and testing within the project team.

name.justification: The study focuses on developing an accessible user interface, which is a core aspect of Human-Computer Interaction.
name.quote: CCS Concepts: • Human-centered computing → Accessibility systems and tools; Accessibility technologies; Human computer interaction (HCI).

name.justification: The paper primarily deals with improving accessibility for users with motor disabilities.
name.quote: Models such as DALL-E 2, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion allow users to enter a text or text+image prompt... ideal for accessibility as text can be entered in many ways, including traditional keyboards, alternative input devices, eye or head movements, or voice.

name.justification: The core study involves the use of text-to-image generation models to create visual art.
name.quote: In this work, we discuss the design and development of PromptAssist, a prototype, accessible interface for creating T2I prompts.

name.justification: DALL-E 2, developed by OpenAI, is mentioned as a notable text-to-image model discussed in the paper.
name.quote: Models such as DALL-E 2, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion allow users to enter a text or text+image prompt, which the system interprets to generate images.

is_contributed.justification: DALL-E 2 is referenced and used but not contributed by the paper.
is_contributed.quote: In this work, we discuss the design and development of PromptAssist, a prototype, accessible interface for creating T2I prompts.

is_executed.justification: The paper illustrates example outputs from DALL-E 2 based on prompts created using PromptAssist.
is_executed.quote: The resulting prompt was copied from PromptAssist into DALL-E and the resulting images are shown in Figure 2.

is_compared.justification: DALL-E 2 is compared with similar models like Midjourney and Stable Diffusion in terms of functionality and accessibility.
is_compared.quote: Models such as DALL-E 2, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion allow users to enter a text or text+image prompt...

referenced_paper_title.value: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with clip latents
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper for DALL-E 2 is related to its generative capabilities from text input.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Models such as DALL-E 2 [36], which creates high-resolution images from text using 650 million image-text pairs...

name.justification: Midjourney is mentioned as an open beta text-to-image model popular among artists, discussed in the paper.
name.quote: Models such as DALL-E 2, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion allow users to enter a text or text+image prompt, which the system interprets to generate images.

is_contributed.justification: Midjourney is referenced and used but not contributed by the paper.
is_contributed.quote: In this work, we discuss the design and development of PromptAssist, a prototype, accessible interface for creating T2I prompts.

is_executed.justification: The paper does not describe any execution details or example outputs for Midjourney.
is_executed.quote: Recently, much attention has been drawn to models that are available to users, often through public betas, include OpenAI’s DALL-E 2, which creates high-resolution images from text using 650 million image-text pairs, Midjourney, an open beta tool popular among artists available as a Discord chatbot.

is_compared.justification: Midjourney is compared with other models like DALL-E 2 and Stable Diffusion in terms of functionality and accessibility.
is_compared.quote: Models such as DALL-E 2, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion allow users to enter a text or text+image prompt...

referenced_paper_title.justification: No specific paper is referenced for Midjourney, it is mentioned as a tool rather than a research contribution.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Midjourney, an open beta tool popular among artists available as a Discord chatbot.

name.justification: Stable Diffusion is discussed as an open-source text-to-image model operable on users’ own devices.
name.quote: Models such as DALL-E 2, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion allow users to enter a text or text+image prompt, which the system interprets to generate images.

is_contributed.justification: Stable Diffusion is referenced and used but not contributed by the paper.
is_contributed.quote: In this work, we discuss the design and development of PromptAssist, a prototype, accessible interface for creating T2I prompts.

is_executed.justification: The paper does not describe any execution details or example outputs for Stable Diffusion.
is_executed.quote: ...Stable Diffusion, an open-source model operable on users’ own devices...

is_compared.justification: Stable Diffusion is compared with other T2I models like DALL-E 2 and Midjourney in terms of functionality and accessibility.
is_compared.quote: Models such as DALL-E 2, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion allow users to enter a text or text+image prompt...

referenced_paper_title.value: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper for Stable Diffusion discusses high-resolution image synthesis, which aligns with the capabilities of Stable Diffusion.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Stable Diffusion [42], an open-source model operable on users’ own devices.
